channel.title: Width stereo effects
channel.description:
Hi,
I am experimenting with dramatically widening my stereo signal in order to achive something similar to what this module does.
http://www.analoguehaven.com/makenoise/qpas/
Any ideas or suggestions about how to patch something similar.
Best and thanks in advance
